subject: mirror.ynet.sk added (was: [backlog] mirror list updates (this time to the public address))
body:
On Wed, May 16, 2007 at 12:48:02PM +0200, Bernhard 'elven' Stoeckner wrote:
> On Tuesday 15 May 2007 22:30:48 Simon Paillard wrote:
> > > +  mirror.ynet.sk/debian
> > >   Aliases: debian.ynet.sk
> 
> Contacted the mirror administrator:
> 
> * Mirror is providing all architectures.
> * Fixed the autoindex opts.
> * Hosted at 1Gbit/s.
> * project/trace fixed.

mirror.ynet.sk has been added to the list: 
Site: mirror.ynet.sk
Alias: debian.ynet.sk
Type: leaf
Archive-http: /debian/
Archive-rsync: debian/
Archive-architecture: alpha amd64 arm hppa hurd-i386 i386 ia64 m68k mips mipsel powerpc s390 sparc
Mirrors-from: ftp.cz.debian.org
Maintainer: sebastian@gentoo.sk
Country: SK Slovakia
Location: Bratislava
Sponsor: Ynet http://www.ynet.sk/
Comment: 1Gbit/s bandwidth


-- 
Simon Paillard


-- 
To UNSUBSCRIBE, email to debian-mirrors-REQUEST@lists.debian.org
with a subject of "unsubscribe". Trouble? Contact listmaster@lists.debian.org
